abstract: In a major revamping of its sluggish clothing business, Wal-Mart Stores will shut two divisions at its headquarters in Arkansas.
snippet: In a major revamping of its sluggish clothing business, Wal-Mart Stores will shut two divisions at its headquarters in Arkansas.
lead_paragraph: In a major revamping of its sluggish clothing business, Wal-Mart Stores will shut two divisions at its headquarters in Arkansas, eliminate dozens of positions and move dozens more to New York City.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Will Shake Up Apparel Unit; Layoffs Set
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Will Shake Up Apparel Unit; Layoffs Set
